name: Penti
description:
The game I made for Ludum Dare 40!

_______________________________________________________________________________________________

In this game, you play as a pentagon who is in a world of geometric shapes. People think that pentagons are bad though, Because everyone else is an octagon. They try to kill you. Now, you are finally armed and ready to fight!

_______________________________________________________________________________________________

CONTROLS

W, A, S, D to move.

Left mouse to shoot.
